abstract: Stocks rise slightly as oil prices make modest recovery.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Exxon Mobil declined after the company reported its smallest quarterly profit in almost 17 years.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Mainly Higher as Oil Prices Reverse Decline
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Keep Market Gains in Check

snippet: Shares of Exxon Mobil declined after the company reported its smallest quarterly profit in almost 17 years....
